Text:
(The only Cid Kagenou from the Midgar Academy for
Dark Knights is me...)
(No, hold up. I don't remember entering myself!)
Oh my...!

A student from the Academy for Dark Knights...?
This lad must be quite confident in his abilities.
*gasp*
*gasp*
At the end of our thorny road...
a happy future awaits us...!

Holy smokes! This kid must have some huge stones if
he thinks he can tackle the trial!
*whistles* Yeah, I'll bet he's king of the campus!
No way in hell am I missin' this!
A round of applause for our brave contender!

The shower of applause is deafening. Someone
whistles, and cheers fill the stadium.
(Wait, stop.)
This is bad. I start to brainstorm.
(I have three options in this situation.)
(Option No. 1—)
(Accept my fate and attempt the trial.)

(If nothing shows up, I'll come out of it as a plain
old side character.)

(But if some super warrior shows up, it's gonna blow
my cover...)

(The level matching here seems pretty spot on, after
all...)
(Option No. 2—)
(Run for it.)

(I mean, I am just an extra at the Academy. Nobody
knows my face, so escaping would be easy.)
(But...this one's a no-go.)

(They already know I go to the Academy, so I could
end up expelled for pissing off the Church.)
(And just think of what Claire would say to me...)
(Option No. 3...)
(Yeah, this is my only move.)
Cid Kagenou! Did you wish to withdraw?!
...There's no sign of the lad.

But...we do see two or three challengers succumb to
fear each year, so...
Hm?
*gasp*
What's that light...?
Whoa...!
It's...gone?
What...was that all about...?
*gasp* Look!
Huh...?
Impossible...!
That's...!
The crowd flies into an uproar.

I went into stealth mode and hid myself at super
speed.

Then, while everybody was fixated on the mysterious
flash, I slipped into my Shadow guise.
I drop into the dome, my long coat flaring behind me.
(This is Option No. 3. Create a distraction.)

(The measure of any bomb is the diversion it creates
when it explodes!)
My name is...
Shadow.
I lurk in the darkness and hunt down shadows...
Shadow...!
What does he want?!
And what of Cid...?!
Ahh, so this is Shadow...
The rat who keeps nipping about at our feet.

I do not know what your purpose is here, but there
are paladins of the Church at the ready in this
arena. You will not escape.
Nelson motions for the paladins to assemble.
And we still have more as well...

May you lament your foolish overestimation of your
own abilities...

Paladins. They're knights who protect the Church,
each selected through baptism.

Beta remembers how when she was younger, these
paladins gave her trouble while she attempted to
rescue a target.

Not that she will put on such a poor showing now,
though.
(Master Shadow... What are you doing?)
※ムービー終了
